decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All existing historic features including, but not limited to, chimney pieces, plasterwork, architraves, panelling, doors, staircase balustrading shall remain undisturbed in their existing position and shall be fully protected during the course of works on site, unless specifically authorised otherwise on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp; The development and works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-eb5711b5-7fff-e382-5e91-4b3de437f224"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that those features which contribute to the special architectural and historic interest of the building are retained and in accordance with Sections 16 and 17 (1) (a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All works of bedding, pointing and rendering shall use a lime based mortar (1 part lime to 3 parts sand).&nbsp; No cementitious mortars or mortars containing Portland cement or any cementitious material shall be used.&nbsp; Pointing shall be slightly (2mm) recessed from the brick surface and not flush, ribbon or weather struck pointing.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b8a8561b-7fff-45df-8c8b-067f0ad78b51"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All new internal and external finishes relating to the development and the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in connection with the approved works) shall match the existing adjacent work in respect of the materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including the methods used, material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any condition(s) attached to this consent.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-729cbc1f-7fff-277d-597f-5948e5459d1b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In accordance with Section 17 (1) (b) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No additional punctuations in the external walls and roofs shall be permitted other than as shown on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-43ffe629-7fff-6515-adc4-f66276e20685"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.</span></p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-df39b5e2-7fff-b76a-76f8-d59bbfd986c5"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In accordance with Section 17 (1) (b) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and to ensure that the special architectural and historic interest of this building is safeguarded and that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.</span></p>
description: Demolition of existing conservatory and erection of single storey lower ground floor rear extension, relocation of wet room under the porch, new front door and internal/external alterations.
